results.title: The Traveller
results.creator_credit: John Hansen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Hansen’s war experience really started after World War II. Having been seconded into the US Navy, John was there to celebrate in the streets of California when the war ended. Then he travelled the world, transporting a variety of things, from war brides to coal. In the end, the world became his classroom.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Hansen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: An Interview with Phil Bailey
results.brief_description: Phil Bailey was a telegrapher - one of a unique cohort of women who were trained in signalling by a forward-thinking female engineer. She has never forgotten morse code due to the wise words of her teacher.

results.title: One hour and twelve minutes left to live
results.creator_credit: Charlie Safstrom, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Charlie Safstrom served as a sniper in Borneo during World War II. Here he recounts one of the more frightening moments of his service where he was almost mistaken for a Japanese soldier during a late night changing of the guard.
results.title_for_label: One hour and twelve minutes left to live
results.creator_credit_for_label: Charlie Safstrom, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Signals : nerves of the army
results.creator_credit: Bruce Christie, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: During the war, without communication, the soldiers were sitting ducks. Signalmen, like Bruce Christie, may not have been on the front line, but, as Bruce illustrates, their role was just as crucial to the war.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Christie, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Nargun and the stars
results.brief_description: Based on Patricia Wrightson’s novel “The Nargun and the stars”, this timeless story takes you to the inner heart of aboriginal myths and The Dreaming.
results.description: Based on Patricia Wrightson’s novel “The Nargun and the stars”, this timeless story takes you to the inner heart of aboriginal myths and The Dreaming.
description_for_label: Based on Patricia Wrightson’s novel “The Nargun and the stars”, this timeless story takes you to the inner heart of aboriginal myths and The Dreaming.

results.title: Nargun
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “The Nargun and the stars”.
Based on Patricia Wrightson’s novel of the same name, this is the story of Simon Brent, a city boy who comes to live with his country relatives after the death of his parents. In this episode Simon must finally face the menacing giant rock, The Nargun.

results.title: Nyols
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Nargun and the stars”.
Based on Patricia Wrightsons novel of the same name, this is the story of Simon Brent who comes to live with country relatives when his parents are killed. In this episode Simon and his cousins Charlie and Eddie discover the menacing Nyols.
results.description:

results.title: Turongs
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Nargun and the stars”.
Based on the novel by Patricia Wrightson, this story of Simon Brent, the city boy who comes to live with his country relatives after the death of his parents, follows the adventures of Simon and his cousins as they meet and battle menacing creatures from the Aboriginal dreamtime. In this episode the intrepid adventurers come face to face with the Turongs.
results.description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Nargun and the stars”.

In this episode the intrepid adventurers come face to face with the Turongs.

results.title: Potkoorok
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Nargun and the stars”.
Based on the novel of the same name by Patricia Wrightson, this is the story of Simon Brent, a city boy sent to live with country relatives after the death of his parents. He resents the move to a different lifestyle and is bored with country life until he meets some ancient creatures that have inhabited the area since Dreamtime. In this episode he stumbles upon The Potkoorok, a fierce and loathesome creature.
